name: tools
description: A collection of utility tools built with React
author: Tools Team

scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && npm run build:standalone:all
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:run
scripts.build:standalone:all: npm run build:standalone:metronome:prod && npm run build:standalone:drum:prod && npm run build:standalone:drum-synth:prod && npm run build:standalone:qr:prod
scripts.build:standalone:metronome: STANDALONE_APP=metronome vite build --config vite.standalone.config.ts && mv dist/standalone/src/standalone/metronome/index.html dist/standalone/metronome.html && rm -rf dist/standalone/src
scripts.build:standalone:metronome:prod: STANDALONE_APP=metronome vite build --config vite.standalone.config.ts --outDir dist/standalone && mv dist/standalone/src/standalone/metronome/index.html dist/standalone/metronome.html && rm -rf dist/standalone/src
scripts.build:standalone:drum:prod: STANDALONE_APP=drum vite build --config vite.standalone.config.ts --outDir dist/standalone && mv dist/standalone/src/standalone/drum/index.html dist/standalone/drum.html && rm -rf dist/standalone/src
scripts.build:standalone:drum-synth:prod: STANDALONE_APP=drum-synth vite build --config vite.standalone.config.ts --outDir dist/standalone && mv dist/standalone/src/standalone/drum-synth/index.html dist/standalone/drum-synth.html && rm -rf dist/standalone/src
scripts.build:standalone:qr:prod: STANDALONE_APP=qr vite build --config vite.standalone.config.ts --outDir dist/standalone && mv dist/standalone/src/standalone/qr/index.html dist/standalone/qr.html && rm -rf dist/standalone/src
